cause.description:
The FUNDACION CORAZON GUERRERO is a charitable organization located in Puerto Rico. Founded by reggaeton artist Daddy Yankee, this organization helps incarcerated youths.
1. You are in control of your life.
2. Incarcerated individuals can life a positive lifestyle.
cause.mission: help troubled youth and ex-convicts to encourage them to lead a positive lifestyle after their release.
cause.name: FUNDACION CORAZON GUERRERO
